name: Monster Munchdown
description:
We had a slightly different team for this jam - a team of 3 programmers! Meaning that this time, art, music and SFX were a bit more difficult to organize!

Credit to Seb for the artwork, and credit to pixabay.com for the majority of the audio used in the game, and credit to Synty particle FX for some of the particle FX used! :)

We spent many hours on saturday struggling to come up with a fun game that fit the theme, that could also be made in 3 hours - so in the end, we actually gave up on saturday! But in the end, Seb came to the rescue with this last-minute banging idea that he put together on saturday night! We spent our saturday adding more gameplay and polishing the game off, and we're super happy with the end result - just the right mix of stressful and rewarding!

This game was completed in 3 hours!

Created for Trijam #173 in 3 hours by: Aidan, Coach, Seb
